name: Remember the Time
wikiSummary: Michael truly surpassed himself in this 9 minute short film directed by John Singleton. The video contained celebrity friends of Michael's, such as Eddie Murphy, Iman, and Magic Johnson, and also featured highly complex dance routines.
wikiText:
Michael truly surpassed himself in this 9 minute short film directed by John Singleton. The video contained celebrity friends of Michael's, such as Eddie Murphy, Iman, and Magic Johnson, and also featured highly complex dance routines.
